1: <pb/><e>A jun b'it tic tzc'anlb'ej junc mach tzjucb'tzan b'it yet' arpa.</e> <pb/><t>Ach Cajlil on̈, 'o'ch cab' a c'ojl 'ayn̈ on̈, 'a' cot a yaxilal 'a quib'n̈ on̈. Scha cab' a c'ojl on̈ eln coti,</t>
2: <t>yic wach' a smasnil jun tzo'n̈ nacion̈ 'ay 'a sat lum lum tic, tzyojquej 'el eb' tas wal a nib'b'en, yet' pax colnb'il tzac'a.</t>
3: <t>Ach qui Diosal on̈, alx cab' wach' paxti 'aych yuj eb' chon̈ab'. Smasnil 'anma', yal cab' eb' wach' paxti 'ayach.</t>
4: <pb/><t>'El cab' yaw eb' 'a tzaljc'ojlal, yujto ach tza b'eyc'ojlej eb' chon̈b' 'a stojlal; ach tza jucb'tzej eb' nacion̈ 'ay 'a yolyib'n̈q'uinl tic.</t>
5: <t>Ach qui Diosal on̈, alx cab' wach' paxti 'aych yuj eb' chon̈ab'. Smasnil 'anma', yal cab' eb' wach' paxti 'ayach.</t>
6: <pb/><t>A lum lu'um xyac' lum sb'a'al, xac' a yaxilal 'a quib'n̈ on̈, yujto qui Diosal ach on̈.</t>
7: <t>'A'n̈j a yaxilal 'a quib'n̈ on̈, niwn cab' el'ch 'a smasnil yolyib'n̈q'uinl tic.</t>
